t: A song of ascents. Of Solomon.
Unless*pn the Lord*s builds the house, the*ld builders labor in vain. Unless*ln the Lord*s watches over the city, the*ld guards stand watch in vain.
In*ln vain you rise early and*ld stay up late, toiling*ln for food to eat— for*ld he grants sleep to those he loves.
Children*pn are a heritage from the Lord,*s offspring*ld a reward from him.
Like*ln arrows in the hands of a warrior are*ld children born in one’s youth.
Blessed*ln is the man whose*ld quiver is full of them. They*ln will not be put to shame when*ld they contend with their opponents in court.
